site_name: The DOMO ProjectCommunity oriented development
slider_txt_1:
Domocoin is an experiment
founded on my Bachelor Thesis:
menu_dwnld_content: The Cryptocurrency will be used as a 'ticket' to enter the Community in the future (proof of ownership). We are developing the first prototype of a new kind of social network approach. Only people holding Domocoins in their wallet will be able to login to the Network. This way mostly only 'crypto' and blockchain enthusiasts will join the Community and create an environment Cryptotwitter is dreaming of. After reaching a decent community-size within the prototype, we will do a official crowdfunding with KYC to kick off the development of a decentralized, autonomous social network, which is not run by a single entity or centralized servers. Domocoin will remain as ticket to enter the community, masternode owners and teammembers (contributors) from the early stage will have a very important role in the network. So this is your chance to join the team in early stages, earn a masternode for your effort and finally build a social network which can´t be taken down by regulations and is maintained by the people actually using it.
menu_feature_title_2: With simplicity and fairness in mind!
menu_dev_content_1: Most Cryptocurrency´s focus on fast transactions, anonymity and beautiful roadmaps to showcase the Coin, which is actually a default feature of every Blockchain. Domocoin will go a different, 'unusual' road.
menu_dev_content_2: Community first! We have infinite opportunities and ways of development. Thanks to our Community-oriented development, EVERYONE has a voice! Contribute your own ideas and get paid in Domocoins!
menu_dev_content_3: Domocoin is the first stage on the road to a truly autonomous Community.
history_release_content: Start of DOMOcoin, a Cryptocurrency based on the X11 algorithm! To ensure a fair distribution people have 1 month to get as many Coins as possible with their miners.
history_fork_content: POW-Phase is over! Domocoin is forking to a 100% POS + Masternodes solution!
history_pivx_content: After troubleshooting many issues with the 100% POS solution, we decided to become a PivX-Clone as it contains all desired features. Please contact us to swap your Coins!
history_exchange_content: We are listed on Cratex! Click on the Image to visit the exchange.
join_us_content: Join us now and become a part of our Road to a truly autonomous Community!
